title: Implement status strings
description: Reimplement `cover list --status ` so that  is read/toread/reading instead of the bare enum values. Update tests and help.

title: Interactive search
description: When using `cover search`, show the top ten results in the appropriate component from the charmbracelet/bubbles component library for bubbletea.

title: Improve TUI styling with lipgloss
description: Add the charmbracelet/lipgloss package to the project and use its methods to improve the presentation of the command in its interactive mode
